caption:
This photograph shows an aerial view of several sailboats spread out over a textured, dark water surface, likely a lake or sea. The demeanor and positions of the boats suggest that this may be a casual sailing or a regatta-type scene. There are a total of eight sailboats, variously colored and each equipped with sails that include hues of red, blue, white, yellow, and green. The sails are filled with wind, indicating a breezy day, suitable for sailing.

The composition of the photograph gives the impression of a peaceful yet active nautical scene, captured from a considerable height, giving the water an almost textured, fabric-like appearance. The overall mood is serene, underscored by the vastness of the water and the small size of the boats, highlighting their graceful navigation through the expanse.
title: Sailboats at sunset on Spinnaker run in race on Commencement Bay. Puget Sound.
